<Meta title="Components (Preview)/Product Configurator V2/Product Configurator V2" component={ProductConfiguratorV2} />

# ProductConfiguratorV2
<br />

## `ProductConfigurators` are used to display and select from the available configurations for a product.
<br />

### Default
<Canvas>
    <Story name="Default">
        <ProductConfiguratorV2 data={productConfiguratorMock} />
    </Story>
</Canvas>

### Without add to cart
<Canvas>
    <Story name="Without add to cart">
        <ProductConfiguratorV2 data={productConfiguratorNoAddToCartCartMock} />
    </Story>
</Canvas>

### Back from cart
<Canvas>
    <Story name="Back from cart">
        <ProductConfiguratorV2 data={productConfiguratorBackFromCartMock} />
    </Story>
</Canvas>

### Without selected edition
<Canvas>
    <Story name="Without selected edition">
        <ProductConfiguratorV2 data={productConfiguratorNoSelectedEditionsMock} />
    </Story>
</Canvas>

### Without addons
<Canvas>
    <Story name="Without addons">
        <ProductConfiguratorV2 data={productConfiguratorWithoutAddons} />
    </Story>
</Canvas>

### Upgrade
<Canvas>
    <Story name="Upgrade Button">
        <ProductConfiguratorV2 data={productConfiguratorUpgradeMock} />
    </Story>
</Canvas>

## Usage Example
<CollapsibleJsonSnippet
    summary="productConfiguratorData"
    code={productConfiguratorMock}
/>

```jsx
import ProductConfiguratorV2
from '@appdirect/sfb-theme-components/src/components/product-configurator-v2/ProductConfiguratorV2';

<ProductConfiguratorV2 data={productConfiguratorData} />

```
